pluginstrument.author: Simstrumentation
pluginstrument.description:
Bombardier CRJ-FMS MCDU Overlay See here for contact info and notes: https://github.com/simstrumentation
THIS INSTRUMENT IS ONLY AN OVERLAY. It must be used in conjunction with pop out instrument from Microsoft Flight Simulator. Right Alt + Click on the FMS screens in MSFS to pop out the windows.
This instrument has a user prop to control either the Pilot or CoPilot FMS.
Ambient back lighting is only supported while using the SIMSTRUMENTATON Ambient Light Dimmer control.
